author: Julie Jargon
title: Papa John’s Wants to Get Back to Making Pizzas
text: Papa John’s Wants to Get Back to Making Pizzas • Papa John’s Wants to Get Back to Making Pizzas More In addition to charging more for pizzas than its chief rivals and facing increasing competition, the company has a unique challenge in how tightly its controversial founder, John Schnatter, is woven into its image. Mr. Schnatter stepped down as chief executive in December amid an uproar over comments he made about the NFL’s handling of its players’ national-anthem protests, which earned him the praise of a white supremacist group.
